The backend has been developed with Node.js and consists of a small server connected to a MySQL database. On the frontend, React and TypeScript with CSS Modules have been used. I used Netlify for the frontend deployment and Railway for the backend deployment.

Proyecto final de Bootcamp, se trata de: Final Bootcamp project, this is a social network where users can interact in various ways.
